attributes.action: Stop the closure/ landfillof two recycling plants in Thornton and leyland.
attributes.background: 300 staff members at two recycling plants in Thornton and leyland which are being shut due to the budget cuts after only being open 6 years. 500 million pounds of tax payer,their have been 3 options put forward to keep the plants running and save jobs but the council have Not helped to save jobs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Your local council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://council.lancashire.gov.uk/mgepetitionlistdisplay.aspx?bcr=1
